steps.name: Given a room with dimensions "5" by "5"
And a hoover starting at position "4", "4"
And the following patches of dirt: "1,0;2,2;2,3"
When the hoover moves according to "E"
Then the final position of the hoover should be "4", "4"
And the number of cleaned patches should be "0"
